Making Friends while Traveling Solo

Traveling solo and making friends from around the world means more opportunity for a free couch around the world.

Great destinations for love this season.

Are you thinking you still need to spice things up more and make all of February your time for love? Then read this, take notes and book a trip for you and your special someone ASAP!

I'm just a girl, traveling the world. Trying to find myself and being as cheesy as possible along the way.
